name: Ngmorrisjs
tagline: Angular 1.x wrapper directives for MorrisJS line, bar and donut Charts
body:
### Ngmorrisjs
This AngularJS wrapper directive for MorrisJS Charts.
MorrisJS Charts are some of the easiest charts to implement. 

### Why Another MorrisJS Angular Directive?
Although there are other wrappers out there, I needed a simple wrapper whereby ANY or ALL of the MorrisJS options could be passed. Point... not the first but one of the easiest to use, yet covers all the MorrisJS options. 

### Authors and Contributors
This project is maintained by Jeff Boothe @jboothe. Feel free to submit pull requests. 

###Todo
- add unit tests
- add e2e tests
